pullRequest.title: Disable Request Waiter Timeout if not within fail fast threshold and Optimize SingleTimeout runnable to not capture callback to deal with the future.cancel behaviour in ScheduledExecutor

nodes.bodyText: within fast fail threshold can be a impl comment

commit.message: Scheduled executor is not cleaning up scheduled job upon cancelling the future
update version in preparation for a releaes

nodes.bodyText: This check should also exist within the constructor and offspring factory where it is passed in. We do address this in a separate PR if you'd like.
SingleTime not part of this PR.
I would rather not put a number in the callback variable, something like: callbackIfTimeout
